segments.text: Those kids are going to get into trouble if they're not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, and the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're doing this right behind their mother's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just a few feet away, drying dishes and not noticing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and they're about to make a mess with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt when that stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And I hope their mother notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
